long_description: Sized for 27.5 in.mountain bikes, the Easton Vice XLT 27.5 in. Rear Wheel is built tough for aggressive trail riding and offers tubeless compatability. UST tubeless compatibility offers the benefits of tubeless (lighter weight, lower tire pressure and fewer flats), with the option of using a traditional tube/tire setup. The Vice XLT 27.5 in. Rear Wheel utilizes a welded alloy rim for excellent strength. 21mm internal rim width allows the use of wide tires for better traction. 24 double-butted, straight-gauge spokes laced in a 3-cross pattern stand up to rough trails. X4 hub rolls smoothly on sealed cartridge bearings for long-lasting performance. Rear hub is compatible with SRAM's XD cassette body.
short_description: Sized for 27.5 in.mountain bikes, the Easton Vice XLT 27.5 in. Rear Wheel is built tough for aggressive trail riding and offers tubeless compatability.
